entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -28.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 10:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -28.6°C

Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 73 %

Dewpoint: -31.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
